title: [K-12] Occupational Ergonomics Masterclass: Mobile-Based Active Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mechanics and public health principles
context.additional_context: Modular content delivery (8-hour volume) in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, enhancing practical skills via discussion-based interaction

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three occupational hazard risk factors and explain prevention strategies.
Learners can write case study reports by applying epidemiological investigation methodologies.
Learners can perform the five-step data analysis procedure using simulation tools provided on mobile platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
